browserActionTitle.description: [Don't Translate] The title of the browser action button

appDescription.message: LiTags enables you to assign tags to players on lichess.org.

appDescriptionWithoutLink.message: LiTags enables you to assign tags to players on
appDescriptionWithoutLink.description: This text is followed by a link to lichess.org

goTo.description: Used in contexts like: 'go to' settings

usersSettingDescription.message: List of Users you have tagged.

tagSetEnabledDescription.message: Enable / disable this set. Once disabled the tags associated with this set will no longer be displayed.

settingLitagsEnabledDescription.message: Use the switch to enable / disable Litags.

deleteUserConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete user %s?
deleteUserConfirm.description: %s is a placeholder for the username of the to be deleted user.

deleteTagConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete tag %s?
deleteTagConfirm.description: %s is a placeholder for the tag name of the to be deleted tag.

deleteSetConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete set %s?
deleteSetConfirm.description: %s is a placeholder for the set name of the to be deleted set.

importConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to import this file? Importing will overwrite all existing data of the entries you have selected.

exportNoneSelectedError.message: Choose at least one entity to export.

importNoneSelectedError.message: Choose at least one entity to import.

importSetSuccess.description: %s is a placeholder for the name of the imported set.

importSetFailure.message: Failed to import the set from the file!

exportSetFailure.message: Failed to export the selected set!

aboutTagSetsDescription.message: Add, edit, delete sets and their respective tags.

aboutUsersDescription.message: A searchable list of all users you have tagged.

aboutBackupDescription.message: Backup or Import your LiTags data. You can choose which type of data to export or import.

aboutContributionDescription.message: You want to contribute to LiTags? Awesome! Check out the project on GitHub and consider joining the Discord server.

aboutCommunityDescription.message: Want to chat? Consider joining the Discord Server! Suggest features, report bugs, ask question or just hang out.

aboutDonateDescription.message: Donations are not required but very appreciated. Currently I only setup PayPal for donations, if you would like to donate via any other means, contact me on Discord or Github.

settingsTagListLimitDescription.message: Change the maximum number of tags to be displayed in the user tag lists on Lichess.

settingsFrequentlyUsedLimitDescription.message: Change the maximum number of tags to be displayed in the frequently used section of the Tag Chooser.

settingsHotkeysDescription.message: You can set available Hotkeys in the your browsers settings: extension shortcuts.
